SEARCH
Package TheGraph

Class LuigiGraph<E>

java.lang.Object
TheGraph.Graph<E>
TheGraph.LuigiGraph<E>
Type Parameters:
E - the type of the elements stored in the vertices of the graph
public class LuigiGraph<E> extends Graph<E>
Class implementing a graph with adjacency lists.

    • removeVertex

      public boolean removeVertex(E vtx)
      Removes the specified vertex from the graph. If the vertex does not exist in the graph, returns false. Otherwise, all arcs and edges connected to the vertex are removed as well.
      Specified by:
      removeVertex in class Graph<E>
      Parameters:
      vtx - the vertex to be removed.
      Returns:
      true if the vertex was successfully removed, false otherwise.

    • removeArc

      public boolean removeArc(E src, E dest)
      Removes the specified arc from the graph. If the arc does not exist in the graph, returns false.
      Specified by:
      removeArc in class Graph<E>
      Parameters:
      src - the source vertex of the arc to be removed.
      dest - the destination vertex of the arc to be removed.
      Returns:
      true if the arc was successfully removed, false otherwise.

    • removeEdge

      public boolean removeEdge(E src, E dest)

      Specified by:
      removeEdge in class Graph<E>
      Parameters:
      src - the source vertex of the edge to be removed.
      dest - the destination vertex of the edge to be removed.
      Returns:
      true if the edge was successfully removed, false otherwise.

    • updateArc

      public boolean updateArc(E src, E dest, double weight)
      Updates the weight of the specified arc. If the graph is not weighted, returns false.
      Specified by:
      updateArc in class Graph<E>
      Parameters:
      src - the source vertex of the arc.
      dest - the destination vertex of the arc.
      weight - the new weight to be set.
      Returns:
      true if the weight of the arc was successfully updated, If the arc does not exist in the graph, returns false.

      dest - the destination vertex of the edge.

      public Double getArcWeight(E src, E dest)

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      src - the source vertex of the arc.
      dest - the destination vertex of the arc.
      Returns:
